remarks: The induced metric of a normed complex vector space is a metric space. Part of Definition 2.2-1 of [Kreyszig] p. 58.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
imsmet.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
imsmet.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
imsmet $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> D e. ( Met ` X ) ) $.
